Articles.Content:
Just wondering if you can change your ksp forum username... for reasons ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

If I would need to make another account, then eh, I can just link to it from thisssssss
Yeah sure just tell me what you would like to be called, everyone gets one namechange ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Sweet, that'll be coming up soon :3

- - - Updated - - -

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-22T22:02:18Z" title="05/22/2015 10:02  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 22, 2015</time> by polan**
Can i get mine changed to worir4? ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
I choose: polan. just polan

Both names changed ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Remember to login with your new usernames, I have sent you both email reminders of your account details.

> 
> Both names changed ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> Remember to login with your new usernames, I have sent you both email reminders of your account details.

I do believe worir4 was joking.... ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
sometime i wonder if it happen that often or not ; ) just a spacemonk kind of though anyway ; )

> 
> I do believe worir4 was joking.... ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

It's hard to tell sometimes... In any case, be careful what you wish for. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Oops lol. I was joking but it's ok I don't think I will ever want to change it any way.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
changing username don't change your IP, rep, post count anyway ; ) so it's some kind of nonsensical request a way not another. May be it's simple to recreate a new account dunno really in fact ...

> 
> Can i get mine changed to worir4? ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

I can't stop laughing, I'm sorry person whom is now worir4.

> 
> I can't stop laughing, I'm sorry person whom is now worir4.

That was his username before, I believe...
It was indeed my username before.... Ah well. I suppose I am stuck with worir4 then. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> It was indeed my username before.... Ah well. I suppose I am stuck with worir4 then. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Odd move to use your one allotted name change to make it exactly what it was. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Odd move to use your one allotted name change to make it exactly what it was. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Poorly misinterpreted joke, I believe. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Good thing you didn't request something unfortunate!
hum may be something like YeahItSYouInTheMirror not sure still yet xDr @worir4

> 
> This seems like an unactive thread....Uh....
> sal\_vager or other mods....i would like a name change because i'm actuallly a bit unhappy with the current one.
> 
> So...i would like my name to be changed to: Mark Kerman <-- make sure it's spelled exactly like that.

Don't worry, the thread is not inactive. I'll send a heads-up.

> 
> Don't worry, the thread is not inactive. I'll send a heads-up.

Ok...

> 
> Poorly misinterpreted joke, I believe. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> Good thing you didn't request something unfortunate!

Ah man, I guess I should be more careful with my jokes. Still this one made me laugh.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Guys guys, Sal was joking about worir4's name change. XD

Anywho, I'm making a Name Change thread for future name changes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

markothefan1, we're not supposed to allow any more\* "Kerman" names, sorry, it'll have to be something else.

\* forgot the more, there are still some Kermen from before the change.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-25T00:23:14Z" title="05/25/2015 12:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 25, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**

hihi just though about [![ly69k.jpg](https://i.imgflip.com/ly69k.jpg)](%5Burl=https%3A//imgflip.com/i/ly69k)[via Imgflip Meme Maker](https://imgflip.com/memegenerator)"]this and

![8000623_15947111_pm.jpg](http://a1.s6img.com/cdn/0021/p/8000623_15947111_pm.jpg) oh guys i m just tired and need some rest ; ) could work also

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-25T00:08:02Z" title="05/25/2015 12:08  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 25, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
  
if it was that simple ; )

> 
> Guys guys, Sal was joking about worir4's name change. XD
> Anywho, I'm making a Name Change thread for future name changes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

So I got counter joked because I thought he was serious when he was not?
